org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint

クラス ToolSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint.ToolSettings

  • public class ToolSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Tool Settings objects group tool-related configuration information.

    • フィールドのサマリー

      フィールド 
      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明
      int airbrushIntensity
      airbrushIntensity: average surface area coverage in region defined by radius per "jot"
      int airbrushRadius
      airbrushRadius: coverage radius in pixels
      org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color commonBackgroundColor
      commonBackgroundColor: current tool background colour
      int commonFillType
      commonFillType: current fill type One of ftNone, ftOutline, ftSolid.
      org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Font commonFont
      commonFont: current font
      org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color commonForegroundColor
      commonForegroundColor: current tool foreground colour
      int commonLineStyle
      commonLineStyle: current line type
      static int ftNone 
      static int ftOutline 
      static int ftSolid 
      int roundedRectangleCornerDiameter
      roundedRectangleCornerDiameter: the diameter of curvature of corners in a rounded rectangle
